programme.title: WNBA
programme.sub-title: Phoenix Mercury at New York Liberty
programme.desc: The East-leading Liberty aim to solve their woes against the Mercury. Phoenix is 2-0 against New York this season. The Liberty strengthened their bench by adding 2019 WNBA Finals MVP Emma Meesseman and ex-Valkyrie Stephanie Talbot to the fold.

programme.title: WNBA On ION Game Break Show
programme.sub-title: WNBA On ION Game Break Show

programme.title: WNBA Basketball
programme.sub-title: Dallas Wings at Golden State Valkyries
programme.desc: The Valkyries return to action by welcoming Paige Bueckers and the Wings to the Chase Center. Dallas defeated Golden State 80-71 on June 17. The Valkyries added French center Iliana Rupert, their expansion pick from the Dream, to the roster July 16.

programme.title: Magnum P.I.
programme.desc: When an Army Ranger goes missing after returning from deployment, Magnum learns of the traumatic news he received upon arriving home and must find him before survivor's guilt consumes him.

programme.title: Magnum P.I.
programme.desc: When a married woman asks Magnum and Higgins to find her lover's killer because she doesn't want to expose the affair to the police, they find the victim wasn't who he claimed to be; Rick visits Icepick, whose health has taken a turn for the worse.

programme.title: Magnum P.I.
programme.desc: When a Marine Corps vet's SUV is stolen with her service dog inside, Magnum and Higgins must find the car, the dog and the car thief who they believe may be an escaped kidnapping victim.

programme.title: Tropical Heat
programme.desc: A woman runs away from her wealthy older husband over a misunderstanding that led to embezzlement and murder.

programme.title: Tropical Heat
programme.desc: A hostage he rescued becomes obsessed with Nick, leading to murder.

programme.title: Tropical Heat
programme.desc: Nick is linked romantically to a duchess on the run from her unfaithful husband.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Booth and Brennan search for a killer who buries his victims alive and leaves them to die if ransom demands are not met.

programme.title: Bones
programme.sub-title: The Headless Witch in the Woods
programme.desc: Brennan and Booth investigate when a headless corpse appears in the woods along with a frightening videotape of events on the night of the murder.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Brennan and Booth investigate the case of a mutilated body found on the roof of a federal building; Brennan hears from her long-lost father.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: A body Brennan and Booth think is that of Brennan's incarcerated adversary, serial killer Howard Epps, is burned beyond recognition.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: After a sexual assault investigation is stalled for months, a woman puts her accusations against a popular athlete on a billboard.

programme.desc: Benson investigates a police officer's accusations of sexual assault; Capt. Tucker's retirement party ends in tragedy.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Kat steps over the line when she suspects a trainer at her boxing gym is taking advantage of his students.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Rollins tries to root out a government worker who is withholding green cards in exchange for sex.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The female CEO of a popular wellness company says she was raped, but her business partner claims the accusation is part of an embezzlement cover-up.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Rollins' sister stirs up trouble and a possible SVU investigation when she reports a doctor who trades prescription painkillers for sex.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An ingénue ballerina discovers she's been secretly videotaped for a pornographic website.

programme.desc: Chief Garland must put friendship aside when a pastor at his church is arrested.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU struggles to find a serial predator who uses a date rape drug that leaves no evidence behind; Rollins receives some good news.

programme.sub-title: The Things We Have to Lose
programme.desc: As Carisi begins the long-anticipated trial of Sir Toby Moore, the SVU faces setbacks in several other cases.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When the squad tries to solve an assault in Central Park, they are hampered by their own blind spots and a community that is losing trust in the police.
